bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: Harvester GUI freezes if a node is edited over the attribute controller.
bug.description:
Describe the bug Harvester GUI freezes if a node is edited over the attribute controller. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Launch Harvester GUI. Connect a camera and start image acquisition. Open the attribute controller; assuming it doesn't expand the node tree by default. Edit a node, BlackLevel for example. You'll see Harvester GUI freezes.
Expected behavior Harvester GUI must not be frozen.

comments.comment: This issue seems to be depending on a specific XML file. I'll keep following up.
